title: Terraventure - Custom Search Engine
description: A custom search engine built using Django, utilizing Google Custom Search API for data and NLTK for keyword extraction. This project helped me learn Django and build a functional search engine named Terraventure.

title: Todo App
description: A simple Todo application created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project was focused on learning JavaScript and utilizing local storage to store the todos.

title: News App
description: A news application built using ReactJS and News API. It features infinite scroll, sections like sports, and uses Context API for state management. This project was my introduction to React.

title: Person Detection
description: An object detection project using Python and OpenCV. I created a custom dataset of 500 images from a video of my college campus, labeled the images, and trained the model over 50 epochs, achieving 85% accuracy.

title: I Notebook - Notes Keeping App
description: A notes-keeping application built using the MERN stack. This project involved integrating a database and writing custom REST APIs for data operations. It was my first MERN stack project.

title: Blog App
description: A blog application created using the MERN stack, featuring authentication with Google login, Cloudinary for CDN and image storage, and a custom markdown feature for writing blogs with code snippets.
